name: Their Last Spring (Buddy up Jam: Winter 2023 and Blossom VN Jam 2023)
name_original: Their Last Spring (Buddy up Jam: Winter 2023 and Blossom VN Jam 2023)
description:
WELCOME TO 'THEIR LAST SPRING' !

I hope you enjoy this visual novel while you're here, I've worked on it really hard. Normally this story was just a silly idea, but then I decided to see it through an make it!

ENJOY!! 

Please read the rest of the description, I've put up warnings, credits,  introductions to characters and features! 

Hugs~

Summary

A tale of three identical sisters who become to grow curious as they age. Making stupid decisions as they go to satisfy their curiosity.

As the saying goes, curiosity killed the cat. 

What will you do when it might become your doom? 

Wilt away in misery, or bloom stronger than before?

It's your choice, and your life. Choose wisely. 

Or else you might be turned into a flower.... ;)

Featuring
  • 5k words (Hmm, depends on  your reading speed but I'd say about 30 minutes)
  • 4 endings
  • Mysterious storyline 
  • Hidden symbolism and meanings 
  • Oh yeah, did I mention this was dedicated to someone? :)
  • Poems section
Warnings
  • Heartthrob
  • stupid choices :)
Characters

Aaaaand another character that reveals themselves under certain circumstances. :))

Credits

Credits to  CHIBI for the sprites, thank you very much!!

Credits to Lornn for the backgrounds, they're really breathtaking. Again, thank you :)
